name: Son Of Skywalker (V)
Lore: 'Luke Skywalker. Son of Anakin. Seeker of Yoda. Levitator of rocks. Ignorer of advice. Incapable of impossible. Reckless is he.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Luke''s Lightsaber is immune to Overload.  May deploy Luke''s Lightsaber from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  While on Dagobah, you lose no Force to Your Destiny or Vengeance Of The Dark Prince.  Immune to attrition < 4.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
